reviews.text: Nice town with a good selection of shops. Bit of a walk from the train station though.

The rail service here is useless, trains are so frequently late that any regular commute will come with a guarantee of lateness. Also you will find abusive staff that will accuse you of stealing when their equipment fails to work. They will take your money and not provide a ticket, when you carry a debit card they fine you. If you use the ticket machine then be very cautious as many of the tickets offered are not valid and the staff use this to express the aforementioned abuse. If you have to use this service buy your tickets from a staffed station like Stafford or Birmingham where the staff treat you with respect. And remember when they are trying to bully fines out of you, you only need to buy a ticket before boarding if you are boarding at a staffed station. Finally when using this station, mind your step in poor weather as they will dodge their responsibility to treat the platforms.

Station itself is fine but occasionally is full off drug using hoodies usually so please be careful and don't go alone at night! 

Ladies this applies to you mainly.
Station is very close to the town centre so you can go shop around before your train is due. Can have quite a bit of litter around some days.
It's a nice station could maybe be a bit cleaner
